name: MKDirections.Response
desc: The route information returned by Apple servers in response to one of your requests for directions.

items.name: var source: MKMapItem
items.desc: The start point of the route.

items.name: var destination: MKMapItem
items.desc: The end point of the route.

items.name: var routes: [MKRoute]
items.desc: An array of route objects representing the directions between the start and end points.
